Math¶

Linear Algebra¶

  • The computational linear algebra for coders course is quite useful to get some practical linear algebra skills.
  • The no bullshit quite to linear algebra is a easy and fun read.
  • The MIT introduction to linear algebra course from Gilbert Strang is pretty accessible
  • Great visualizations are in 3Blue1Brown Videos

Statistics¶

  • the course inproving your statistical interference on coursera does a great job in clarifying p-values, bayesian vs. frequentist statistics and experimental design
